long_description: A picnic blanket, tablecloth, tent footprint, toga and superhero cape all in one, there's almost nothing that the 98 x 98 in. Ticla Camp Hero Tarp can't do. Talk about a bang for your buck! Steel grommets on all four corners make it easy to tie the Camp Hero up as a shade or shelter. Reinforced seams and durable, polyurethane-coated polyester fabric withstand the abuse of kids, pets and parties. The Ticla Camp Hero Tarp comes with a handy stuff sack for transport and storage.
short_description: A picnic blanket, tablecloth, tent footprint, toga and superhero cape all in one, there's almost nothing that the 98 x 98 in. Ticla Camp Hero Tarp can't do. Talk about a bang for your buck!
